Summary: I was playing catch with my uncle and when he thru the ball, I followed the ball to catch it and when looking upwards I saw the sky and saw a dark grey sauser looking object ... very big so big that I actually saw the blue ring witch was the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsPlaying catch outside with a relative when I was about 11 to 14, not to sure sorry. He thru the ball and when I looked and reached for the ball I saw a very very big disk shape, dark,and dull but very quiet and just in that fram when looking at the ball to catch I could even see the thin outer ring of blue sky. very detailed and the blue ring (sky) was far and thin. I don't remember if I ever caught the ball because I was shocked I guess but did mention it to my relative and was so excited that I told my grandfather then went home and told everyone I could ... they just laughed and said "yeah sure you did" the very next day in the newspaper it showed a sauser like object "ufo" that looked very familiar of what I saw ... above the "ufo' photo on the paper said "There's Proof" I can remember it like if it happened a year ago. I never looked into it further and I didn't even read the article on it so I would love to share my story with Mufon and tell them that I know a better way to see ufo's if your looking for them in the sky's. Thank you!!
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around June 10th 1980
